title: ALL SOLD : T206 Brooklyn Dodgers (The Superbas!) Pastorious Rucker Bergen
author: tolstoi

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD : T206 Brooklyn Dodgers (The Superbas!) Pastorious Rucker Bergen
posts.post_content:
I am selling the following T206's and am hoping these all find a good home.  By the way, these cards are beautiful and I just love the color schemes of the Brooklyn Blue and white...great subset to collect. Paypal Gift Preferred.  Free Shipping :)

William Bergen Piedmont vgex $29 Sold :)
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_060958_zps3024f147.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_061005_zps351f0537.jpg[/IMG]

Nap Rucker Portrait Piedmont SGC 20 $29 Sold :)
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_060834_zps0c094c4f.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_060841_zps1657f53f.jpg[/IMG]

Pastorious Pitching Piedmont ex $30 Sold :)
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_061025_zpsb5ca14d2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc434/tolstoi1/20140815_061033_zps53f6ec3e.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take Rucker throwing and Bell hands over head.  PM coming.

Ryan, I will take the Pastorius Sweet Cap back for $39. Please PM me again with your Paypal address. I'll send the PP friends & family, then shoot you a PM back with the confirmation # and my address.

It's nice to be doing business with you again!

Bill

Edit: got my card today. A real beauty! Thank you again, Ryan, for the great transaction.
